message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product, and I think you'd really love it. I'm offering it to you for $175. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your suggestion, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $140?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I can't go down to $140, I'm willing to come down to $160. This is still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit. What do you say?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think $150 would be a fair price for both of us considering my budget and the value of the product. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
